RelatedSentence: Gandhi once said that a country governed poorly by its own people is better than good governance by a foreign power .
Gandhi once said that a country governed poorly by its own people is better than good governance by a foreign power .

What he did not admit to was that , once independent , India would benefit from the British legacy of a trained bureaucracy , an international language , and an advanced system for communications , including railways and governance .
